item.description:
BNI, the world's largest referral networking organization, has over 5,300 chapters in 40 countries. The North Shore Networkers Chapter invites individuals interested in learning more about how to empower your business through word of mouth marketing to attend our Visitor's Day, Thursday, January 14th, from 7 a.m. until 8:30 a.m.

Belonging to BNI is like having dozens of sales people working for you. It's based on the proven concept of what goes around comes around. Like-minded business people gather to share qualified, quality referrals.

If referrals are an important part of your business, or should be, then BNI is the organization for you.

Join us January 14th to learn more about BNI and meet the members of our Chapter. Please bring plenty of business cards.

If you are interested but unable to attend, please contact Christine Bolzan: christine@graduatecareercoaching.com
item.name: North Shore Networkers Visitor's Day
